content.rendered:
Global Trading and Sourcing Corporation (GTS) is a specialized procurement services company dedicated to helping our customers improve their bottom line. Our highly trained team has a proven record of meeting our customers’ sourcing and procurement performance needs and for shortening the supply chain.

Fortune 500 and Tier-One companies contract with GTS to provide customized solutions that meet their very specific procurement needs.

Your GTS team of knowledgeable industry professionals continually delivers cost-effective, OEM solutions that will significantly enhance your procurement experience… “On time, every time”!

Learn more
